DOC.brief_summary: 0-hypothesis: advisory support does not 1. prolong the the breast-feeding period 2. minimize the risk of obesity and metabolic dysfunction in infants of obese mothers
DOC.brief_title: Minimizing the Risk for Obesity During Infancy by Extensive Advisory Service
DOC.criteria: Healthy, term infants Informed and written consent obtained from both parents Sick infants Preterm infants No consent
